title: Nice Private furnished apartment- August One month Only
posting_body: ['Hi.', 'Are you looking for a sane, furnished, clean, quiet and short term private rental?', 'We are renting a furnished quiet apartment for the month of August.', 'Located at Broadway and Belleview...10 minutes to the DTC CENTER, Highlands Ranch, Littleton...I25 and Santa Fe Blvd access anywhere in city easily.', 'Furnished private apartment that includes the entire 3rd floor of a vintage home, available August 1.', 'Cleanly and lightly furnished apartment.', 'Includes Furnished and Private:', '*bedroom', '*living room', '*bathroom.', '*Storage area', '* Private HVAC system', '* Wifi', 'Rent is $1500 plus $300 security deposit.', 'Background chk.', 'No smoking/no vaping property.', 'Available August 1']
